Write protection for USB_DEVICE_EXCHG_PINS USB_OTG11_EXCHG_PINS USB_DEVICE_DREFH USB_OTG11_DREFH USB_PHY_SEL USB_DEVICE_DREFL USB_OTG11_DREFL
Disable force chip go to download mode function
Represents whether the SPI0 controller is disabled in boot_mode_download
Set this bit to enable selection between usb_to_jtag and pad_to_jtag through strapping gpio10 when both reg_dis_usb_jtag and reg_dis_pad_jtag are equal to 0.
Set these bits to soft disable JTAG (odd number 1 means disable). JTAG can be enabled in HMAC module.
Hard disable JTAG. JTAG is disabled permanently.
Disable flash encryption when in download boot modes.
Enable revoke first secure boot key
Enable revoke second secure boot key
Enable revoke third secure boot key
Configures the clock random divide mode to determine the DPA security level
Represents whether defense against DPA attack is enabled
Represents whether print from USB-Serial-JTAG during ROM boot is disabled
Represents whether the USB-Serial-JTAG download func- tion is disabled
b00:force print. b01:control by GPIO8 - low level print. b10:control by GPIO8 - high level print. b11:force disable print.
Force ROM code to send a resume command during SPI boot
Represents whether FAST VERIFY ON WAKE is disabled or enabled when Secure Boot is enabled
